content: Xianren Mausoleum is a tomb of the Korean period, which is protected, and most of the tombs have some restrictions. Especially in the cemetery scenic spots, but for most tourists, the distance is not close enough to see the details of stone carvings or the details of these mausoleums.

The emperor in the Mausoleum of Xianren invented the Korean script, which was considered the first golden age of the Korean Dynasty between the 14th and 15th centuries A.D. The open area of mausoleums is very limited. Like the Ming Tombs, most of them are graves on the surface of the earth. The tombs and the stone carvings of the watchmen imitate China.

This is the mausoleum of the King and Queen of Korea, and it is also a world cultural heritage. It is free to visit here without tickets. The environment here is very good, the trees are shady, and you can come and visit it when you have time.

Located in the Valley Cave of Ruicao District, Seoul, the Mausoleum of Xianren (Mausoleum) at the foot of Damu Mountain is a combination of the two mausoleums of Xian Mausoleum and Ren Mausoleum. Xianling is the tomb of Taizong (1367-1422) and Queen Yuanjing (1365-1420), the third generation king of the Korean era. Renling is the tomb of Chunzu (1790-1834) and Queen Chunyuan (1789-1857), the 24th generation king of the Korean era. The King's Mausoleum of Korea is of great historical value and has been included in the UNESCO World Cultural Heritage List. Roughly 30 minutes to 1 hour, if the tour time is abundant, there is a fresh air trail behind the Mausoleum, but the road surface will be slippery in rainy days. The Wuli Forest (Alder Forest) at the entrance of the trail is the special management zone of Seoul as an ecological landscape protection area. In the past, the tree was used as a symbol every five miles on the road, so the name of the tree was named after it.
It is the joint name of the two mausoleums of Xian Mausoleum and Ren Mausoleum. It is called Xian Ren Mausoleum. It has historical value and is listed as a world cultural heritage.
Xian Ren Mausoleum is the tomb of the King and Queen of Korea. It is a world cultural heritage. It is worth visiting. It is a free scenic spot.

The Grand Hyatt Stadium is located on 2nd Street, Grand Hyatt-dong, Central District, Seoul. It is a large-scale complex of Korea's dome-shaped arena. It officially opened on February 1, 1963. The gymnasium can not only carry out basketball, volleyball, handball and other balls, boxing, weightlifting, wrestling and other domestic/outside sports competitions, but also hold international competitions, concerts, farm music and other cultural performance activities.
